page.title: 16OLD AGE IN LENHAM
page.content: In the village of Lenham there is ample accommodation for old age pensioners.There are seven blocks of houses, from almshouses to luxury accommodation for the retired. Atwater Court is a luxury development of 8 flats and 15 cottages. There is a resident warden. Lenham House has 2 wardens and can accommadate 35 people in flatlets. There are 10 Douglas Almshouses, 5 Honywood Almshouses, 9 council bungalows in Rivers Walk and 5 more in Foord Road. Westwood is a nursing home for the elderly. A free bus for old age pensioners runs weekly to Maidstone and back. There are several very active clubs or societies which are of interest to retired people. Lenham enjoys the services of a well equipped surgery, run by four doctors and assisted by three nurses.
